scripts.install:all: npm --prefix dashboard install && npm --prefix server install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n dashboard,server -c cyan,magenta "npm --prefix dashboard run dev" "npm --prefix server run dev"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n dashboard,server,ai -c cyan,magenta,green "npm --prefix dashboard run dev" "npm --prefix server run dev" "node scripts/run-ai-engine.js"
